New Records: Vladimir Guerrero Jr. tied Rafael Devers with 333 extra-base hits by the age of 25
Key Match Events: The Toronto Blue Jays lost to the Boston Red Sox 6-3 on Tuesday night at Fenway Park
Pre-Game Insights: The Blue Jays will take on the Red Sox once again on Wednesday night, with Chris Bassitt pitching against Bryan Bello
Post-Match Reflections: The loss halted the Jays winning streak and dropped them to 65-69 on the season
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Red Sox moved up to 68-64 and are now 4.0 games back of the Minnesota Twins in the battle for the third and final wild card spot in the American League
Others: Vladimir Guerrero Jr. is hitting.322 with 27 homers, 87 RBI and a.956 OPS this season
